EmailTemplate.name: Trial Onboarding - Experienced vs Inexperienced - GTM-1296.ACQ - Experienced - D
EmailTemplate.subject: Quickly fill your store with products
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Learn how to quickly to add products to your BigCommerce store. Call 1-844-632-8912 for assistance on selecting a BigCommerce plan today. Log in to your control panel <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+4+Email+4&utm_content=Control+Panel]]> Get started now ADDÂ PRODUCTS <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/deep-links/index.php?ToDo=addProduct]]> There are many ways to get products into your BigCommerce store:
- Bulk import from a CSV file <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Importing-Data/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+4+Email+4&utm_content=Bulk+import]]>
- Sync your inventory from Square <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Syncing-Your-Products-with-Square/?q=square&l=en_US&fs=Search&pn=1?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+4+Email+4&utm_content=Sync+Inventory]]>
- Manually add products <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Adding-Products?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=Experienced&utm_term=Day+4+Email+4&utm_content=Manually+add+products]]>
